hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin 'Umar said:"During the time the Messenger of Allah we used to buy food, and he sent someone to tell us to remove it from the place where we had bought it, to another place, b before selling

chapter.ara-name: باب بَيْعِ مَا يُشْتَرَى مِنَ الطَّعَامِ جُزَافًا قَبْلَ أَنْ يُنْقَلَ مِنْ مَكَانِهِ
chapter.eng-name: .Selling food that one has Bought Unmeasured before removing it from the Place of Sale
